summary:
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY

I have experience in supply chain, factory managing and purchasing for 20 years. I worked with customers and vendors in Asia, Europe, the USA and the UK among others. I was responsible for keeping contacts and coordination of activities in an international environment with different cultures.

SKILLS
•	Management
•	Strong communication  
•	Team building
•	Customer management
•	Purchasing management 
•	Sourcing management 
•	Inventory management 
•	Supply chain management
•	Production management
•	Import and Export management
•	Logistic management 
•	Microsoft Office 
•	ERP
•	CRM
•	ISO13485
•	GMP / HACCP 
•	FMCG
•	English

 PROFESSIONAL HISTORY
2014-2018 NTN Trading-Thailand Co.,Ltd
NTN imports medical surgery devices from USA, Europe, China, Taiwan, South Korea and Israel and sells to Thai hospitals.
Experience
Purchasing manager, Import and export management  (2014-2018)

2011-2014 Oishifood Co.,Ltd
Oishifood is the bakery. It employs about 100 persons.  GMP/ HACCP and FMCG 
Experience
Factory manager (2011-2014)

2001 – 2009 CASDAY THAILAND CORP.,Ltd
This company is one of leading manufacturers of figurines and gift items, produced from porcelain, resin, bronze and pewter. Customers are Disney Classic in USA for Disney items, Royal Doulton in UK for Harry Potter items and popular English ladies figurines, Goebel Porzellanfabrik in Germany, Hallmark Inc. (USA) for Hallmark items. 
Experience
Customer Service (2001-2003)  
Inventory control and purchasing manager (2003-2004) 
Section Production Manager (2005-2009)

1997-2001 USA THAI Group
This company is mainly an export / domestic sales  business  in the decorative item and gift market. 
I worked as a marketing and design and product development manager. 
My main responsibility was marketing, export and product development. 
Experience
Marketing and customer service  (1997-1999)
Design and product development manager (1999 -2001)

PERSONAL DETAILS
l have a Netherlands residence permit. 
Working allowed free from restriction and work permit not required. 
Verblijfstitel (regulier bepaalde tijd) valid until 20-07-2023. TWV niet vereist.
I will apply for Dutch citizenship in the future. 

2018-present
I moved to the Netherlands in August 2018. 
My main activity has been learning the Dutch language and I do a volunteer job.

education.field_of_study: Major Monetary Economics, Minor International Economics

profile_positions.description:
NTN Trading-Thailand Co.,Ltd
NTN imports medical surgery devices from USA, Europe, China, Taiwan, South Korea and Israel and sells to Thai hospitals.

Experience 
Purchasing manager 
    • Cost control
    • Pricing negotiation with supplier
    • Organizing  relationships with partners
    • Manage import shipment
    • Import document control
    • Selection of suppliers who have a ISO13485 and Certificate of Free Sale
    • Organizing yearly product training
    • Introduction of a purchasing system
    • Motivation employees and organize employee satisfaction (HR)
    • “Just in time” delivery control
profile_positions.title: Purchasing Supervisor

profile_positions.description:
2011-2014 Oishifood Co.,Ltd
Oishifood is the bakery (bread, sandwiches, cakes) of “Oishi Brand” for mass-products in the lower market and “The Kitz Brand” in the higher market (FMCG: fast moving consumer goods). It employs about 100 persons.
profile_positions.title: Factory Manager

profile_positions.description:
CASDAY THAILAND CORP. ltd
This company is one of leading manufacturers of figurines and gift items, produced from porcelain, resin, bronze and pewter. Customers are Disney Classic in USA for Disney items, Royal Doulton in UK for Harry Potter items and popular English ladies figurines, Goebel Porzellanfabrik in Germany, Hallmark Inc. (USA) for Hallmark items. 

Experience
Section Production Manager (2005-2009)
    • Responsible for production planning
    • Responsible for production cost control
    • Responsible for production control
    • Responsible for quality control
    • Responsible for quantity control
    • Responsible for labors management
    • Responsible for production sample team management
    • Responsible for weekly report for utilization of production to management
    • Responsible for monthly report for utilization of production to management
    • Daily consultation and problem solving with customer service, purchasing, production, product development, quality assurance and factory manager.
profile_positions.title: Section Production Manager

USA THAI Group
This company is mainly an export / domestic sales  business  in the decorative item and gift market.

Design and product development manager
